Articles.Content: What are the orbital parameters for an Eve sentinel? I haven't had a contract for that come up yet and I'm sick of waiting. I want to launch one now an start scanning Eve orbit when it gets there. I have contract up to build an asteroid station in Eve orbit, and I'd prefer not having to tow one from Kerbin or Moho.
I don't think it has to be all that precise. Put it in solar orbit between Moho and Eve, somewhat closer to the latter. Like, try two thirds of the way towards Eve.
The parameters are randomized, and generally have a large error margin.
